title: Compilation fails on Azure Functions Blob Trigger
body:
### Describe the bug

When implementing an Azure Functions Blob Trigger compilation fails.  I have a reproducer: https://github.com/jeremyrdavis/azure-functions-blob-trigger

The Blob Trigger code is copied from the Azure Functions examples: https://github.com/azure-samples/azure-functions-samples-java/blob/master/triggers-bindings/src/main/java/com/functions/BlobTriggerFunction.java

### Expected behavior

I exepect the application to compile with "./mvnw clean compile"

### Actual behavior


### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/jeremyrdavis/azure-functions-blob-trigger/tree/main

Add a Function using a Blob Trigger based on the examples provided by Microsoft

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin jedavis-mac 23.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 23.3.0: Wed Dec 20 21:30:44 PST 2023; root:xnu-10002.81.5~7/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.10" 2024-01-16 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment Microsoft-8902769 (build 17.0.10+7-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Microsoft-8902769 (build 17.0.10+7-LTS, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.7.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.3 (21122926829f1ead511c958d89bd2f672198ae9f) Maven home: /Users/jeremyrdavis/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.9.3-bin/326f10f4/apache-maven-3.9.3 Java version: 17.0.10, vendor: Microsoft, runtime: /Users/jeremyrdavis/.sdkman/candidates/java/17.0.10-ms Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "14.3", arch: "aarch64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

_No response_
